answers.answer: Absolutely normal. Prop your feet up and have someone rub them. If they start clubbing or turning purple go in but swollen feet are just a nasty side effect
Normal but a sign of preeclampsia also

question: Hi ladies i was wondering was it normal to have swollen feet its been like this for about 2 1/2 days and there really red at the bottom. I tried staying off my feet and elevate them. Should i call my doctor?
title: swollen feet-Normal?
